name: AlCHeMoS
description:
Prepare for a truly unique gaming experience! Free Demo to try before you buy!

AlCHeMoS is a new kind of action game set in atomic worlds.

In AlCHeMoS, you'll pilot a Proto-Atomic Shell - a device that collects and combines subatomic particles to create elements - as you explore real, weirder-than-fiction atomic worlds based on real scientific data.

Play it your way


Go fast and beat your friends' best times, or take your time and explore, relaxing as you take in the dynamic music.

Complete additional objectives for Quarks - rewards used to upgrade your Proto-Atomic Shell: including movement speed, jumping and dashing power, energy regeneration, enemy radar range, energy efficiency for shooting particles, and radiation resistance.

You'll need these upgrades as you are opposed by the ever-evolving evil forces of Dark Matter, seeking to stop you at every turn!


Unleash powerful atomic abilities


As you progress, you'll discover powerful abilities, such as emitting gamma ray particles that freeze enemies, creating and traversing quantum tunnels and even completely annihilating Dark Matter!

Features:
  • Fully raymarched environments with beautiful lighting, reflections, shadows and more
  • Dynamic music and sounds that adapt as you progress
  • Discover each of the 118 currently known elements
  • Real protein structure environments built on real scientific experimental data!
  • Earn quarks to upgrade every aspect of your atom, from movement power, jumping and dashing, through to resisting radiation and more efficient anti-dark matter particle emissions!
  • Complete a variety of side objectives to earn powerful unlockable abilities, such as freezing gamma-ray particles, quantum tunnelling and annihilation!
  • Flee from or combat enemy atoms who seek to undergo Fusion with you
  • Customise your laboratory workbench with unlockable interactive ornaments
